flavorText:
"Why should I boast? The bards will do it for me—and with music."
—Ertai, wizard adept

foreignData.name: Tolarianischer Hypnotiseur
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Tolarianische Hypnotiseur von einer Kreatur geblockt wird, übernimm am Ende des Kampfes die Kontrolle über diese Kreatur.

name: Tolarian Entrancer
originalText: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer is blocked by any creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.

rulings.text: The control change has no duration; you’ll retain control of that creature until the game ends or until some other effect causes it to change control. It doesn’t matter if Tolarian Entrancer leaves the battlefield, or if Tolarian Entrancer has already left the battlefield by the time the “at end of combat” ability triggers.

text: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.
